Method.name: InsImpReport
Method.Description: Description: 医疗不良事件中的重要标记 Creator: yangyongtao CreateDate: 2016-4-27 Table: DHC_MedAdrReport Input: 报告表数据 Return： 数据id Others: w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).InsImpReport("144","N")
Method.Implementation: N (adrRepID,adrRepImpFlag) I adrRepImpFlag="N" D .S adrRepImpFlag="Y" E S adrRepImpFlag="N" ;2016-10-17 &SQL(Update DHC_MedAdrReport Set MEDADR_RepImpFlag=:adrRepImpFlag where MEDADR_RowID=:adrRepID) I SQLCODE'=0 Q SQLCODE Q +%ROWID

Method.name: InsMedReport
Method.Description: Description: 保存 医疗不良事件报告表 Creator: CongYue CreateDate: 2016-03-30 Table: DHC_MedAdrReport Input: DataList:医疗不良事件报告表数据信息 Return： 保存成功 返回报告ID，保存失败 返回错误值 Others: w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).InsMataReport("MEDREP20160331001^2^24^^^^^^^事件过程描述^^^^^^^^^600^63^^^0000000001^^2016-03-31^10:10:59^5||2^1^^")
Method.Implementation:
N (dataList)
S adrNo=..GetAdrReportCurMaxNo("MEDREP"_$zd(+$H,8),"3") //报告单号 $p(dataList,"^",1) S adrPatSex=$p(dataList,"^",2) //性别 S adrPatAge=$p(dataList,"^",3) //年龄 S adrPatJob=$p(dataList,"^",4) //职别 S adrAdmDate=$p(dataList,"^",5) //诊疗日期 S:adrAdmDate'="" adrAdmDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateHtmlToLogical(adrAdmDate) S adrAdmTime=$p(dataList,"^",6) //诊疗 时间 S:adrAdmTime'="" adrAdmTime=$zth(adrAdmTime,1) S adrLiveLoc=$p(dataList,"^",7) //现场相关科室 S adrResult=$p(dataList,"^",8) //不良后果 S adrResultDesc=$p(dataList,"^",9) //不良后果描述 S adrProcDesc=$p(dataList,"^",10) //过程描述 S adrLevel=$p(dataList,"^",11) //等级 S adrReason=$p(dataList,"^",12) //原因 S adrHandInfo=$p(dataList,"^",13) //处理情况 S adrAdvice=$p(dataList,"^",14) //处理意见 S adrImprovie=$p(dataList,"^",15) //改进情况 S adrRepUserCareer=$p(dataList,"^",16) //报告人职业 S adrPartyType=$p(dataList,"^",17) //当事人类别 S adrCarPrvTp=$p(dataList,"^",18) //报告人职称
S adrRepUserDr=$p(dataList,"^",19) //报告人 S adrRepUser="" I adrRepUserDr'="" S adrRepUser=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",adrRepUserDr),"^",1) //报告人工号 S adradrRepDeptDr=$p(dataList,"^",20) //报告人科室 S adradrRepDept="" I adradrRepDeptDr'="" S adradrRepDept=$p(^CTLOC(adradrRepDeptDr),"^",1)
S adrRepTel=$p(dataList,"^",21) //报告人联系电话 S adrEmail=$p(dataList,"^",22) //报告人邮件
S adrPatID=$p(dataList,"^",23) //病人登记号 S adrPlace=$p(dataList,"^",24) //不良事件场所 S adrCreateDate=$p(dataList,"^",25) //创建日期 S:adrCreateDate'="" adrCreateDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateHtmlToLogical(adrCreateDate) S adrCreateTime=$p(dataList,"^",26) //创建时间 S:adrCreateTime'="" adrCreateTime=$zth(adrCreateTime,1) S adrCurStatusDR="" //$p(dataList,"^",27) //当前状态
S ReportTypeCode=$p($p(dataList,"^",28),"!",3) //类别 S ReportTypeDrs=$o(^DHCMEDADREVT(0,"Code",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(ReportTypeCode),"")) //类别指向 s ReportTypeDr=$p(dataList,"^",28) s $p(ReportTypeDr,"!",3)=ReportTypeDrs
S adrRemark=$p(dataList,"^",29) //备注 S adrPlaceOth=$p(dataList,"^",30) //不良事件场所其它 S adrAnonymFlag=$p(dataList,"^",31) //匿名标志 S adrRepImpFlag=$p(dataList,"^",32) //重要标记 S adrAdmNo=$p(dataList,"^",33) //就诊ID
S adrDateOccu=$p(dataList,"^",34) //日期 S:adrDateOccu'="" adrDateOccu=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateHtmlToLogical(adrDateOccu) S adrTimeOccu=$p(dataList,"^",35) //时间 S:adrTimeOccu'="" adrTimeOccu=$zth(adrTimeOccu,1)
s MEDADRInjuryLevel=$p(dataList,"^",36) //伤害严重程度 &SQL(Insert Into DHC_MedAdrReport(MEDADR_No,MEDADR_Sex,MEDADR_Age,MEDADR_Job, MEDADR_AdmDate,MEDADR_AdmTime,MEDADR_LiveLoc,MEDADR_Result,MEDADR_ResultDesc,MEDADR_ProcDesc, MEDADR_Level,MEDADR_Reason,MEDADR_HandInfo,MEDADR_Advice,MEDADR_Improvie,MEDADR_RepUserCareer, MEDADR_PartyType,MEDADR_CarPrvTp,MEDADR_RepName,MEDADR_RepLocDr,MEDADR_RepTel,MEDADR_Email, MEDADR_PatID,MEDADR_CreateDate,MEDADR_CreateTime,MEDADR_AdrPlace,MEDADR_Remark,MEDADR_AdrPlaceOth, MEDADR_ReportType,MEDADR_CurStatus_DR,MEDADR_AnonymFlag,MEDADR_RepImpFlag,MEDADR_AdmNo,MEDADR_DateOccu,MEDADR_TimeOccu,MEDADR_InjuryLevel
) Values(:adrNo,:adrPatSex,:adrPatAge,:adrPatJob, :adrAdmDate,:adrAdmTime,:adrLiveLoc,:adrResult,:adrResultDesc,:adrProcDesc, :adrLevel,:adrReason,:adrHandInfo,:adrAdvice,:adrImprovie,:adrRepUserCareer, :adrPartyType,:adrCarPrvTp,:adrRepUser,:adradrRepDept,:adrRepTel,:adrEmail, :adrPatID,:adrCreateDate,:adrCreateTime,:adrPlace,:adrRemark,:adrPlaceOth, :ReportTypeDr,:adrCurStatusDR,:adrAnonymFlag,:adrRepImpFlag,:adrAdmNo, :adrDateOccu,:adrTimeOccu,:MEDADRInjuryLevel
))
I SQLCODE'=0 Q SQLCODE Q +%ROWID

Method.name: UpdMedReport
Method.Description: Description: 更新 医疗不良事件报告表 Creator: CongYue CreateDate: 2016-03-30 Table: DHC_MedAdrReport Input: 报告表id , 报告表数据 Return： 保存成功 返回报告ID，保存失败 返回错误值 Others: w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).UpdMedReport("15","MEDREP20180816001^1^13岁0月^^^^^^^1^^1^1^^^^^^7054^69^^^101100000009^10^2018-08-16^14:55:24^10||4^RT15!管路事件!NursingRep^^^^N^14^^^")
Method.Implementation:
N (adrRepID,dataList) S adrNo=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",1) //报告单号 S adrPatSex=$p(dataList,"^",2) //性别 S adrPatAge=$p(dataList,"^",3) //年龄 S adrPatJob=$p(dataList,"^",4) //职别 S adrAdmDate=$p(dataList,"^",5) //诊疗日期 S:adrAdmDate'="" adrAdmDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateHtmlToLogical(adrAdmDate) S adrAdmTime=$p(dataList,"^",6) //诊疗 时间 S:adrAdmTime'="" adrAdmTime=$zth(adrAdmTime,1) S adrLiveLoc=$p(dataList,"^",7) //现场相关科室 S adrResult=$p(dataList,"^",8) //不良后果 S adrResultDesc=$p(dataList,"^",9) //不良后果描述 S adrProcDesc=$p(dataList,"^",10) //过程描述 S adrLevel=$p(dataList,"^",11) //等级 S adrReason=$p(dataList,"^",12) //原因 S adrHandInfo=$p(dataList,"^",13) //处理情况 S adrAdvice=$p(dataList,"^",14) //处理意见 S adrImprovie=$p(dataList,"^",15) //改进情况 S adrRepUserCareer=$p(dataList,"^",16) //报告人职业 S adrPartyType=$p(dataList,"^",17) //当事人类别 S adrCarPrvTp=$p(dataList,"^",18) //报告人职称 S adrRepUserDr=$p(dataList,"^",19) //报告人 S adrRepUser="" I adrRepUserDr'="" S adrRepUser=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",adrRepUserDr),"^",1) //报告人工号 S adradrRepDeptDr=$p(dataList,"^",20) //报告人科室 S adradrRepDept="" I adradrRepDeptDr'="" S adradrRepDept=$p(^CTLOC(adradrRepDeptDr),"^",1) S adrRepTel=$p(dataList,"^",21) //报告人联系电话 S adrEmail=$p(dataList,"^",22) //报告人邮件 S adrPatID=$p(dataList,"^",23) //病人ID S adrPlace=$p(dataList,"^",24) //不良事件场所 S adrCreateDate=$p(dataList,"^",25) //创建日期 S:adrCreateDate'="" adrCreateDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateHtmlToLogical(adrCreateDate) S adrCreateTime=$p(dataList,"^",26) //创建时间 S:adrCreateTime'="" adrCreateTime=$zth(adrCreateTime,1) S adrCurStatusDR=$p(dataList,"^",27) //当前状态 S ReportTypeCode=$p($p(dataList,"^",28),"!",3) //类别 S ReportTypeDrs=$o(^DHCMEDADREVT(0,"Code",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(ReportTypeCode),"")) //类别指向 s ReportTypeDr=$p(dataList,"^",28) s $p(ReportTypeDr,"!",3)=ReportTypeDrs
S adrRemark=$p(dataList,"^",29) //备注 S adrPlaceOth=$p(dataList,"^",30) //不良事件场所其它 S adrAnonymFlag=$p(dataList,"^",31) //匿名标志 S adrRepImpFlag=$p(dataList,"^",32) //重要标记 S adrAdmNo=$p(dataList,"^",33) //就诊ID S adrDateOccu=$p(dataList,"^",34) //日期 S:adrDateOccu'="" adrDateOccu=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateHtmlToLogical(adrDateOccu) S adrTimeOccu=$p(dataList,"^",35) //时间 S:adrTimeOccu'="" adrTimeOccu=$zth(adrTimeOccu,1) s MEDADRInjuryLevel=$p(dataList,"^",36) //伤害严重程度 &SQL(update DHC_MedAdrReport set MEDADR_No=:adrNo,MEDADR_Sex=:adrPatSex,MEDADR_Age=:adrPatAge,MEDADR_Job=:adrPatJob, MEDADR_AdmDate=:adrAdmDate,MEDADR_AdmTime=:adrAdmTime,MEDADR_LiveLoc=:adrLiveLoc,MEDADR_Result=:adrResult,MEDADR_ResultDesc=:adrResultDesc,MEDADR_ProcDesc=:adrProcDesc, MEDADR_Level=:adrLevel,MEDADR_Reason=:adrReason,MEDADR_HandInfo=:adrHandInfo,MEDADR_Advice=:adrAdvice,MEDADR_Improvie=:adrImprovie,MEDADR_RepUserCareer=:adrRepUserCareer, MEDADR_PartyType=:adrPartyType,MEDADR_CarPrvTp=:adrCarPrvTp,MEDADR_RepName=:adrRepUser,MEDADR_RepLocDr=:adradrRepDept,MEDADR_RepTel=:adrRepTel,MEDADR_Email=:adrEmail, MEDADR_PatID=:adrPatID,MEDADR_CreateDate=:adrCreateDate,MEDADR_CreateTime=:adrCreateTime,MEDADR_AdrPlace=:adrPlace,MEDADR_Remark=:adrRemark,MEDADR_AdrPlaceOth=:adrPlaceOth, MEDADR_ReportType=:ReportTypeDr,MEDADR_CurStatus_DR=:adrCurStatusDR,MEDADR_AnonymFlag=:adrAnonymFlag,MEDADR_RepImpFlag=:adrRepImpFlag,MEDADR_AdmNo=:adrAdmNo, MEDADR_DateOccu=:adrDateOccu,MEDADR_TimeOccu=:adrTimeOccu,MEDADR_InjuryLevel=:MEDADRInjuryLevel where MEDADR_RowID=:adrRepID ) I SQLCODE'=0 Q SQLCODE Q +%ROWID

Method.name: SaveMedReport
Method.Description: Description: 保存 医疗不良事件报告表 Creator: CongYue CreateDate: 2016-03-30 Table: DHC_MedAdrReport Input: 报告表id , 报告表数据 , matadrRepAuditList:以字符"^"分割,格式为:报告审核状态^用户ID^科室ID^安全组ID^下一个科室指向^科室建议^接收状态^报告类型 Return： 保存成功 0,保存失败 非0 Others: w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).SaveMedReport("","MEDREP20160705001^2^25^^^^^^^事件过程描述:^^存在隐患：^改进建议^^^^11^11^600^63^^^0000000001^10^2016-07-05^08:10:36^^med^^^^N^1^2016-07-05^08:10:47","")
Method.Implementation:
N (adrRepID,adrRepDataList,adrRepAuditList,flag) s ^tempwml("SaveMedReport")=$lb(adrRepID,adrRepDataList,adrRepAuditList,flag) S ret=0 I adrRepID="" D .S ret=..Insert(adrRepDataList,adrRepAuditList,flag) E D .S ret=..Update(adrRepID,adrRepDataList,adrRepAuditList,flag)
//不良事件提交成功发送消息提醒到各个科室 add by wangminglong 2019-8-2 start i ((+ret="0")&(ret'="")&(flag="1")) d .S CreatDoc=$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",2) .S EpisodeID=$p(adrRepDataList,"^",33) //就诊ID .S ReportTypeCode=$p($p(adrRepDataList,"^",28),"!",3) //类别 .S ReportTypeDr=$o(^DHCMEDADREVT(0,"Code",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(ReportTypeCode),"")) //类别指向 .S ReceiveDocs="" .S Locs="130^122^127^129^138^107^128^82^139" .S ConsultID=$p(ret,"^",2)_"||"_ReportTypeDr .d ..SendMessageNew(CreatDoc,EpisodeID,ReceiveDocs,Locs,ConsultID) //不良事件提交成功发送消息提醒到各个科室 add by wangminglong 2019-8-2 end Q ret

Method.name: SendMessageNew
Method.Description: Descript: 不良事件发送到消息 add wangminglong 2019-8-2 Input : 发送医生，就诊，接收医生，科室ID，申请ID w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).Sendmessagenew("7053","36360","6986","122^82","90")
Method.Implementation: n (CreatDoc, EpisodeID, ReceiveDocs,LocID,ConsultID) s ^tempwml("SendMessageNew")=$lb(CreatDoc, EpisodeID, ReceiveDocs,LocID,ConsultID) q:CreatDoc="" "-1001" q:EpisodeID="" "-1002" s Url=""""_"dhcadv.matareportquery.csp?EpidsodeID="_EpisodeID_"&ConsultID="_ConsultID_"""" s Link="{""link"":"_Url_",""BizObjId"":"""_ConsultID_"""}" s ToLocRowId=LocID_"|ADRs" s Ret=##class(websys.DHCMessageInterface).Send("不良事件回复","1083",CreatDoc , EpisodeID,"",ReceiveDocs, Link,ToLocRowId) q Ret

Method.name: Insert
Method.Description: Description:保存 医疗不良事件报告表 Creator: CongYue CreateDate: 2016-03-31 Table: DHC_MedAdrReport Input: 报告表数据 , adrRepAuditList :以字符"^"分割,格式为:报告审核状态^用户ID^科室ID^安全组ID^下一个科室指向^科室建议^接收状态^报告类型 Return： "0^"_adrRepID:保存成功标志^报告表id
Method.Implementation:
N (adrRepDataList,adrRepAuditList,flag) S Err=0 TS S adrRepID=..InsMedReport(adrRepDataList) I adrRepID<0 tro Q:adrRepID<0 adrRepID
b //更新状态 S TypeDr="" S nextStatuDr="" S TypeCode=$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",8) //类别 S TypeDr=$o(^DHCMEDADREVT(0,"Code",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(TypeCode),"")) //类别指向 I flag="1" D .S adtList=adrRepID_"^"_TypeDr_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",2)_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",3)_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",4)_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",9) .S nextStatuDr=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).GetRepNextStatusDr(adtList) .///提报权限中如果跟直接审核权限下相同，则跳过直接审核那一步 add by wangminglong 2019-4-23 start .i $p(adrRepAuditList,"^",9)=0 d ..s LgGroupID=$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",4) ..s nextStatuDr=##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).FindStatus(nextStatuDr,LgGroupID) ..s $p(adrRepAuditList,"^",7)=1 //接收状态 .///提报权限中如果跟直接审核权限下相同，则跳过直接审核那一步 add by wangminglong 2019-4-23 end I (flag="1")&(+nextStatuDr'>0) tro Q:(flag="1")&(+nextStatuDr'>0) nextStatuDr b ;123 I flag="1" D .&sql(update DHC_MedAdrReport set MEDADR_CurStatus_DR=:nextStatuDr where MEDADR_RowID=:adrRepID) .I SQLCODE'=0 tro .I SQLCODE'=0 S Err="-16" b ;234 Q:Err'=0 "-16"
S adrRepAuditList=nextStatuDr_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",2,7)_"^"_TypeDr
b //不良反应报告审批流程[默认插入初始状态] I adrRepAuditList'="" D .S Err=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).InsRepAudit(adrRepID,adrRepAuditList) I Err'=0 tro Q:Err'=0 "-18" b ;345 TC Q "0^"_adrRepID

Method.name: Update
Method.Description: Description:保存 医疗不良事件报告表 Creator: CongYue CreateDate: 2016-03-31 Table: DHC_MedAdrReport Input: 报告表id,报告表数据 , adrRepAuditList :以字符"^"分割,格式为:报告审核状态^用户ID^科室ID^安全组ID^下一个科室指向^科室建议^接收状态^报告类型 Return： "0^"_adrRepID:保存成功标志^报告表id
Method.Implementation:
N (adrRepID,adrRepDataList,adrRepAuditList,flag)
S Err=0 S RepStatus=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",27) ;报告当前状态 TS S adrRepID=..UpdMedReport(adrRepID,adrRepDataList) I adrRepID<0 tro Q:adrRepID<0 adrRepID
//更新状态 S TypeDr="" S nextStatuDr="" S TypeCode=$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",8) //类别 S TypeDr=$o(^DHCMEDADREVT(0,"Code",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(TypeCode),"")) //类别指向 ;^7054^69^23^^^^bldevent^0 I flag="1" D .S adtList=adrRepID_"^"_TypeDr_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",2)_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",3)_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",4)_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",9) .S nextStatuDr=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).GetRepNextStatusDr(adtList) .///提报权限中如果跟直接审核权限下相同，则跳过直接审核那一步 add by wangminglong 2019-4-23 start .i $p(adrRepAuditList,"^",9)=0 d ..s LgGroupID=$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",4) ..s nextStatuDr=##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).FindStatus(nextStatuDr,LgGroupID) ..s $p(adrRepAuditList,"^",7)=1 //接收状态 .///提报权限中如果跟直接审核权限下相同，则跳过直接审核那一步 add by wangminglong 2019-4-23 end
I (flag="1")&(+nextStatuDr'>0) tro Q:(flag="1")&(+nextStatuDr'>0) nextStatuDr
I flag="1" D .&sql(update DHC_MedAdrReport set MEDADR_CurStatus_DR=:nextStatuDr where MEDADR_RowID=:adrRepID) .I SQLCODE'=0 tro .I SQLCODE'=0 s Err="-16"
Q:Err'=0 "-16" S:flag=1 adrRepAuditList=nextStatuDr_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",2,7)_"^"_TypeDr S:flag=0 adrRepAuditList=RepStatus_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",2,7)_"^"_TypeDr ;S adrRepAuditList=nextStatuDr_"^"_$p(adrRepAuditList,"^",2,7)_"^"_TypeDr //不良反应报告审批流程[默认插入初始状态] I adrRepAuditList'="" D .S Err=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).InsRepAudit(adrRepID,adrRepAuditList) I Err'=0 tro Q:Err'=0 "-17"
TC
Q "0^"_adrRepID

Method.name: DelMedReport
Method.Description: Description: 删除 医疗不良事件报告表 Creator: CongYue CreateDate: 2016-04-01 Table: DHC_MedAdrReport Input: 报告表id Return: 删除成功 0,删除失败 非0 Others: w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).DelMedReport("36^600")
Method.Implementation:
N (params) S adrRepID=$p(params,"^",1) S UserID=$p(params,"^",2) S repUser=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",19) //填报人 S repCurStatDR=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",27) //当前状态 S repUserID="" I repUser'="" D .S repUserID=$o(^SSU("SSUSR",0,"SSUSR_Initials",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(repUser),"")) Q:UserID'=repUserID -1 //不是本人，不能删除 Q:repCurStatDR'="" -2 //已提交，不能删除
&SQL(DELETE DHC_MedAdrReport WHERE MEDADR_RowID=:adrRepID) Q SQLCODE

Method.name: getMedInfo
Method.Description: Description: 获取页面默认信息（日期，编码） Creator: CongYue CreateDate: 2016-03-31 Input: params : 以字符"^"分割,格式为:人员id^科室id^安全组id^报告类型代码 Return: 页面默认信息: 以字符"^"分割,格式为:报告编码^报告日期^报告初始状态^报告类型^科室描述 Others: w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).getMataInfo()
Method.Implementation:
N (params) S repdate=$zdt($H,3) S Prefix="MEDREP"_$zd(+$H,8) //报告编码规则 "MATADR"+年月日+顺序号 S MedNo=..GetAdrReportCurMaxNo(Prefix,"3") S List=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).GetStatusDr(params) Q:List="" -1 S MedReportType=$p(List,"^",1) //报告类型 S MedInitStatDR=$p(List,"^",2) //审核状态 S LocID=$p(params,"^",2) //科室ID I LocID'="" D .S LocDesc=$p(^CTLOC(LocID),"^",2)
Q MedNo_"^"_repdate_"^"_MedInitStatDR_"^"_MedReportType_"^"_$g(LocDesc)

Method.name: GetAdrReportCurMaxNo
Method.Description: Description: 取当前不良反应报告最大码 Creator: CongYue CreateDate: 2016-03-31 Input: 报告编码规则,编码数字长度 Return: 当前不良反应报告最大码
Method.Implementation:
N (Prefix,NoLen) s ^tempwml("GetAdrReportCurMaxNo")=$lb(Prefix,NoLen) S NextNo="" L +^DHCPHCMADR("DHCPHCMADR",Prefix):10 E Q -100 S PreLen=$L(Prefix) S MinSuffix=1 F i=1:1:NoLen-1 S MinSuffix="0"_MinSuffix S MinNo=Prefix_MinSuffix //最小码 S CurLen=PreLen+NoLen //单号长度 ///表里记录的最大码 S CurrMaxNo=..GetMaxCodeByCode(Prefix) S CurPrefix=$E(CurrMaxNo,1,PreLen) S CurrNo=$E(CurrMaxNo,PreLen+1,CurLen)
I Prefix'=CurPrefix D .S NextNo=MinNo .L -^DHCPHCMADR("DHCPHCMADR",Prefix) Q:NextNo'="" NextNo
S Suffix=CurrNo+1
S slen=$L(Suffix) S flen=NoLen-slen F i=1:1:flen S Suffix="0"_Suffix S NextNo=Prefix_Suffix L -^DHCPHCMADR("DHCPHCMADR",Prefix) Q NextNo

Method.name: GetMaxCodeByCode
Method.Description: Description: 获取当前最大码 Creator: CongYue CreateDate: 2016-03-31 Input: 报告编码规则,编码数字长度 Return: 当前不良反应报告最大码
Method.Implementation: N (Prefix) Q:Prefix="" "" S medcode="" &sql(select max(MEDADR_No) into medcode from DHC_MedAdrReport Where MEDADR_No %STARTSWITH %ALPHAUP :Prefix) Q medcode

Method.name: GetMedRepInfo
Method.Description: Description: 获取 医疗不良事件报告表 信息 Creator: CongYue CreateDate: 2016-03-31 Table: DHC_MedAdrReport Input: 报告表id Return： 报告表数据 Others: w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).GetMedRepInfo("23","7054^51^23^med")
Method.Implementation:
N (adrRepID,params)
Q:'$d(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID)) "" S adrNo=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",1) // 报告号 S adrPatSex=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",2) //性别 S adrPatAge=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",3) //年龄 S adrPatJob=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",4) //病人职业 S adrAdmDate=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",5) //就诊日期 I adrAdmDate'="" S adrAdmDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateLogicalToHtml(adrAdmDate) S adrAdmTime=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",6) //就诊时间 I adrAdmTime'="" S adrAdmTime=$zt(adrAdmTime,1) S adrLiveLoc=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",7) //现场相关科室 S adrResult=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",8) //不良后果 S adrResultDesc=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",9) //不良后果描述 S adrProcDesc=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",10) //过程描述 S adrLevel=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",11) //等级 S adrReason=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",12) //原因 S AdrHandInfo=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",13) //处理情况 S adrAdvice=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",14) //处理意见 S adrImprovie=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",15) //改进情况 S adrRepUserCareer=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",16) //报告人职业 S adrPartyType=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",17) //当事人类别 S adrCarPrvTp=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",18) //报告人职称
S adrRepUserCode=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",19) //填报人 S adrRepUserDr="" S adrRepUser="" I adrRepUserCode'="" D .S adrRepUserDr=$o(^SSU("SSUSR",0,"SSUSR_Initials",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(adrRepUserCode),"")) .S adrRepUser=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",adrRepUserDr),"^",2)
S adradrRepDeptCode=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",20) //科室 S adradrRepDeptDr="" S adradrRepDept="" I adradrRepDeptCode'="" D .S adradrRepDeptDr=$o(^CTLOC(0,"Code",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(adradrRepDeptCode),"")) .S adradrRepDept=$p(^CTLOC(adradrRepDeptDr),"^",2)
S adrRepTel=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",21) //报告人联系电话 S adrEmail=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",22) //报告人邮件 S adrPatNo="" S adrPatNo=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",23) //病人登记号 s adrPatID="",medicalNo="" I adrPatNo'="" S adrPatID=$O(^PAPERi("PAPMI_PatNo",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(adrPatNo),"")) I adrPatID'="" D .S medicalNo=$p(^PAPER(adrPatID,"PAT",1),"^",22) //病案号 S adrPlace=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",24) //不良事件场所 S adrCreateDate=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",25) //报告日期 I adrCreateDate'="" S adrCreateDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateLogicalToHtml(adrCreateDate) S adrCreateTime=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",26) //报告时间 I adrCreateTime'="" S adrCreateTime=$zt(adrCreateTime,1) S adrCurStatusDR=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",27) //当前状态 S ReportTypeDr=1 ;$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",30) //报告类型 S ReportTypeCode=$p(^DHCMEDADREVT(ReportTypeDr),"^",1) S adrRemark=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",28) //备注 S adrPlaceOth=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",29) //不良事件场其它 S adrAnonymFlag=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",31) //匿名标志 S adrRepImpFlag=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",32) //重要标记 S adrAdmNo=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",33) //就诊ID S adrDateOccu=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",34) //日期 I adrDateOccu'="" S adrDateOccu=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateLogicalToHtml(adrDateOccu) S adrTimeOccu=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",35) //时间 I adrTimeOccu'="" S adrTimeOccu=$zt(adrTimeOccu,1) ;S PatInfo=##class(web.DHCADVMEDCOMMON).GetPatBaseInfo(adrPatNo,adrAdmNo) //就诊信息 S PatInfo=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).getRepPatInfo(adrPatNo,adrAdmNo) //就诊信息
;S param=patNo_"^"_patName_"^"_sexId_"^"_patSex_"^"_patAge_"^"_medicalNo_"^"_birthday_"^"_IDcard_"^"_admdate_"^"_admtime_"^"_patdiag ;S param=param_"^"_curWardDesc_"^"_curWard_"^"_nationdr_"^"_countrydr_"^"_patTelH_"^"_address_"^"_weight_"^"_height
;S EpisodeID=$p(PatInfo,"^",2) S AdmWardID="" ;I EpisodeID="" S AdmWardID=$p(^PAADM(EpisodeID),"^",70) //病区 S PatDiag=$p(PatInfo,"^",11) //诊断 S Sexdr=$p(PatInfo,"^",4) //性别 S Admdate=$p(PatInfo,"^",9) //就诊日期 S PatName=$p(PatInfo,"^",2) //病人姓名 S AdmWardID="",AdmWardDesc="" S:adrAdmNo'="" AdmWardID=$p(^PAADM(adrAdmNo),"^",70) //病区 I AdmWardID'="" S AdmWardDesc=$p(^PAWARD(+AdmWardID),"^",2) S medsrAuditID=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(0,"Pointer",ReportTypeDr,adrRepID,""),-1) I medsrAuditID="" D .S adrNextLoc="" .S adrLocAdvice="" .S adrReceive="" E D .S adrNextLoc=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(medsrAuditID),"^",7) .S adrLocAdvice=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(medsrAuditID),"^",8) .S adrReceive=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(medsrAuditID),"^",9) S List=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).GetStatusDr(params) S adrInitStatDR=$p(List,"^",2) //初始状态
s newtype=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",30) //报告类型 s InjuryLevel=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",59) //伤害程度
S ListData=adrNo_"!"_adrPatSex_"!"_adrPatAge_"!"_adrPatJob_"!"_adrAdmDate_"!"_adrAdmTime_"!"_adrLiveLoc S ListData=ListData_"!"_adrResult_"!"_adrResultDesc_"!"_adrProcDesc_"!"_adrLevel_"!"_adrReason S ListData=ListData_"!"_AdrHandInfo_"!"_adrAdvice_"!"_adrImprovie_"!"_adrRepUserCareer_"!"_adrPartyType S ListData=ListData_"!"_adrCarPrvTp_"!"_adrRepUser_"!"_adradrRepDept_"!"_adrRepTel_"!"_adrEmail S ListData=ListData_"!"_adrPatNo_"!"_adrPlace_"!"_adrCreateDate_"!"_adrCreateTime_"!"_adrCurStatusDR_"!"_ReportTypeDr S ListData=ListData_"!"_adrRemark_"!"_adrPlaceOth_"!"_PatDiag_"!"_medicalNo_"!"_adrInitStatDR S ListData=ListData_"!"_adrNextLoc_"!"_adrLocAdvice_"!"_adrReceive_"!"_PatName_"!"_adrRepUserDr_"!"_adradrRepDeptDr S ListData=ListData_"!"_adrAnonymFlag_"!"_AdmWardID_"!"_ReportTypeCode_"!"_adrRepImpFlag_"!"_adrAdmNo_"!"_adrDateOccu_"!"_adrTimeOccu_"!"_AdmWardDesc S ListData=ListData_"!"_newtype_"!"_InjuryLevel
Q ListData

Method.name: getMedRepExportInfo
Method.Description: Description: 获取医疗不良事件报告表 信息(打印/导出) Creator: yangyongtao CreateDate: 2016-05-27 Table: DHC_MedAdrReport Input: 报告表id Return： 报告表数据 Others: w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).getMedRepExportInfo("23")
Method.Implementation:
N (adrRepID) Q:'$d(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID)) "" S adrNo=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",1) // 报告号 S adrPatSex=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",2) //性别 S:adrPatSex'="" adrPatSex=$p(^CT("SEX",adrPatSex),"^",2) S adrPatAge=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",3) //年龄 S adrPatJob=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",4) //病人职业 S adrAdmDate=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",5) //就诊日期 I adrAdmDate'="" S adrAdmDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateLogicalToHtml(adrAdmDate) S adrAdmTime=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",6) //就诊时间 I adrAdmTime'="" S adrAdmTime=$zt(adrAdmTime,3) S adrLiveLoc=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",7) //现场相关科室 S adrResult=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",8) //不良后果 S adrResultDesc=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",9) //不良后果描述 S adrProcDesc=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",10) //过程描述 S adrLevel=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",11) //等级 S adrReason=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",12) //原因 S AdrHandInfo=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",13) //处理情况 S adrAdvice=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",14) //处理意见 S adrImprovie=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",15) //改进情况 S adrRepUserCareer=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",16) //报告人职业 S adrPartyType=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",17) //当事人类别 S adrPartyType=$S(adrPartyType="11":"医师",adrPartyType="12":"药师",adrPartyType="13":"技师",adrPartyType="14":"护理人员",adrPartyType="15":"管理人员",adrPartyType="16":"其他",1:"")
S adrCarPrvTp=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",18) //报告人职称 S adrCarPrvTp=$S(adrCarPrvTp="11":"高级",adrCarPrvTp="12":"中级",adrCarPrvTp="13":"初级",adrCarPrvTp="14":"士级",1:"")
S adrRepUserCode=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",19) //填报人 S adrRepUserDr="" S adrRepUser="" I adrRepUserCode'="" D .S adrRepUserDr=$o(^SSU("SSUSR",0,"SSUSR_Initials",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(adrRepUserCode),"")) .S adrRepUser=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",adrRepUserDr),"^",2)
S adradrRepDeptCode=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",20) //科室 S adradrRepDeptDr="" S adradrRepDept="" I adradrRepDeptCode'="" D .S adradrRepDeptDr=$o(^CTLOC(0,"Code",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(adradrRepDeptCode),"")) .S adradrRepDept=$p(^CTLOC(adradrRepDeptDr),"^",2)
S adrRepTel=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",21) //报告人联系电话 S adrEmail=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",22) //报告人邮件
S adrPatNo=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",23) //病人登记号 s adrPatID="",medicalNo="" I adrPatNo'="" S adrPatID=$O(^PAPERi("PAPMI_PatNo",$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(adrPatNo),"")) I adrPatID'="" D .S medicalNo=$p(^PAPER(adrPatID,"PAT",1),"^",22) //病案号 S adrPlace=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",24) //不良事件场所 S adrPlace=$S(adrPlace="10":"急诊",adrPlace="11":"门诊",adrPlace="12":"病房部",adrPlace="16":"手术室",adrPlace="13":"医技检查室",adrPlace="14":"后勤区域",adrPlace="15":"其他",1:"") S adrCreateDate=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",25) //报告日期 I adrCreateDate'="" S adrCreateDate=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateLogicalToHtml(adrCreateDate) S adrCreateTime=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",26) //报告时间 I adrCreateTime'="" S adrCreateTime=$zt(adrCreateTime,1) S adrCurStatusDR=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",27) //当前状态 S ReportTypeDr=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",30) //报告类型
S ReportTypeCode=ReportTypeDr ;$p(^DHCMEDADREVT(ReportTypeDr),"^",1) ;S ReportTypeCode=$S(ReportTypeCode="med":"医疗",ReportTypeCode="bldevent":"输血不良事件",ReportTypeCode="blood":"输血不良反应",ReportTypeCode="material":"器械",ReportTypeCode="drug":"药物不良反应",ReportTypeCode="drugerr":"用药差错",1:"") S adrRemark=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",28) //备注 S adrPlaceOth=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",29) //不良事件场其它 S adrAnonymFlag=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",31) //匿名标志 S adrRepImpFlag=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",32) //重要标记 S adrAdmNo=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",33) //就诊ID S adrDateOccu=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",34) //日期 I adrDateOccu'="" S adrDateOccu=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).DateLogicalToHtml(adrDateOccu) S adrTimeOccu=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",35) //时间 I adrTimeOccu'="" S adrTimeOccu=$zt(adrTimeOccu,3) S PatInfo="" i adrAdmNo'="" S PatInfo=##class(web.DHCADVCOMMON).getRepPatInfo(adrPatNo,adrAdmNo) //就诊信息 s MEDADRInjuryLevel=$p(^DHCMEDADRR(adrRepID),"^",59) //伤害程度 s MEDADRInjuryLevel=$case(MEDADRInjuryLevel,10:"轻度伤害或无伤害",11:"中度伤害",12:"重度伤害",13:"极重度伤害",14:"死亡",:"") ;S PatInfo=##class(web.DHCADVMEDCOMMON).GetPatBaseInfo(adrPatNo,adrAdmNo) //就诊信息 ;S EpisodeID=$p(PatInfo,"^",2) S AdmWardID="" S AdmWardDesc="" ;I EpisodeID="" S AdmWardID=$p(^PAADM(EpisodeID),"^",70) //病区 S PatDiag=$p(PatInfo,"^",11) //诊断 S Sexdr=$p(PatInfo,"^",4) //性别 S Admdate=$p(PatInfo,"^",9) //就诊日期 S PatName=$p(PatInfo,"^",2) //病人姓名 s birthdate=$p(PatInfo,"^",7) //出生日期 s bedno=$p(PatInfo,"^",27) //床号 s attending=$p(PatInfo,"^",22) //主诊医师
I adrAdmNo'="" S AdmWardID=$p(^PAADM(adrAdmNo),"^",70) //病区 I AdmWardID'="" S AdmWardDesc=$p(^PAWARD(AdmWardID),"^",2) //病区Desc ;I AdmWardDesc["-" S AdmWardDesc=$P(AdmWardDesc,"-",2) //以"-"截取字符 S medsrAuditID=$o(^DHCMEDREPADT(0,"Pointer",ReportTypeDr,adrRepID,""),-1) I medsrAuditID="" D .S adrNextLoc="" .S adrLocAdvice="" .S adrReceive="" E D .S adrNextLoc=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(medsrAuditID),"^",7) .S adrLocAdvice=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(medsrAuditID),"^",8) .S adrReceive=$p(^DHCMEDREPADT(medsrAuditID),"^",9)
S adrListData=adrCreateDate_"&&"_adrCreateTime_"&&"_adrNo_"&&"_ adrPatNo_"&&"_AdmWardDesc_"&&"_medicalNo //5 S adrListData=adrListData_"&&"_PatName_"&&"_adrPatSex_"&&"_adrPatAge_"&&"_PatDiag //9 S adrListData=adrListData_"&&"_adrAnonymFlag_"&&"_adrRepUser_"&&"_adradrRepDept_"&&"_adrAdmDate_"&&"_adrAdmTime //14 S adrListData=adrListData_"&&"_adrPartyType_"&&"_adrCarPrvTp_"&&"_adrRepTel_"&&"_adrEmail_"&&"_ReportTypeCode //19 S adrListData=adrListData_"&&"_adrPlace_"&&"_adrPlaceOth_"&&"_adrProcDesc_"&&"_adrReason_"&&"_AdrHandInfo_"&&"_adrDateOccu_"&&"_adrTimeOccu //26 S adrListData=adrListData_"&&"_MEDADRInjuryLevel_"&&"_birthdate_"&&"_bedno_"&&"_attending w $l(adrListData,"&&") Q adrListData

Method.name: FindStatus
Method.Description: 提报权限中如果跟直接审核权限下相同，则跳过直接审核那一步 wangminglong 2019-4-23 start w ##class(web.DHCADVMEDADRREPORT).FindStatus("18||1",25)
Method.Implementation:
s ^tempwml("FindStatus",adrInitStatDR)=$lb(adrInitStatDR,LgGroupID) S AdrEwiID=$p(adrInitStatDR,"||",1) s ItmDr="" S CH="" F S CH=$o(^DHCADREVTWFI(AdrEwiID,"ADREWI",CH)) Q:CH="" D .S Code=$p(^DHCADREVTWFI(AdrEwiID,"ADREWI",CH),"^",1) //代码 .S Desc=$p(^DHCADREVTWFI(AdrEwiID,"ADREWI",CH),"^",2) //描述 .S OrderNo=$p(^DHCADREVTWFI(AdrEwiID,"ADREWI",CH),"^",3) //顺序号 .q:Desc'["直接领导" .S ItmDr=AdrEwiID_"||"_CH
if ItmDr'="" d .s AdrwfgID="" .F S AdrwfgID=$o(^DHCADREVTWFGR(0,"ItmDr",ItmDr,AdrwfgID)) Q:AdrwfgID="" D ..S ParRefDr=$p(^DHCADREVTWFGR(AdrwfgID),"^",1) // ..S ItmDR=$p(^DHCADREVTWFGR(AdrwfgID),"^",2) // ..S Type=$p(^DHCADREVTWFGR(AdrwfgID),"^",3) //类型 ..S Pointer=$p(^DHCADREVTWFGR(AdrwfgID),"^",4) //指针 ..q:(LgGroupID'="")&&(LgGroupID'=Pointer) ..S adrInitStatDR=ItmDr q adrInitStatDR
